title: Industry Trend Analysis
description: An agent must analyze a collection of recent news articles and reports to identify the top 3 emerging trends in the retail industry.

tasks.description: Process a folder of 20 documents (news articles, reports).
Identify the most frequently mentioned concepts and technologies across all documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies recurring keywords like 'AI', 'sustainability', and 'personalization'.

tasks.description: Summarize the top 3 trends and provide a brief explanation for each.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a concise summary of the key industry trends.
